item.title: Deneme
item.description: library(tidyverse) ## -- Attaching packages ------------------------------------------------------ tidyverse 1.3.0 -- ## <U+221A> ggplot2 3.3.0 <U+221A> purrr 0.3.3 ## <U+221A> tibble 3.0.0 <U+221A> dplyr 0.8.5 ## <U+221A> tidyr 1.0.2 <U+221A> stringr 1.4.0 ## <U+221A> readr 1.3.1 <U+221A> forcats 0.5.0 ## -- Conflicts --------------------------------------------------------- tidyverse_conflicts() -- ## x dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ## x dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() iris %>% select(everything(), -starts_with("X")) %>% top_n(10) ## Selecting by Species ## Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width Species ## 1 6.

item.title: highlighted code showcase
item.description: Tranquilpeak Hugo theme have its own theme to highlight source code. It’s based on GitHub theme: simple and elegant. Check out how it sublimate source codes.

item.title: Tags plugins showcase
item.description: This post is used to show how tag plugins are displayed. See docs for more info.
